description: Create column recon-subject at index 5 based on column subject_as_recorded using expression grel:if(isBlank(cells["structured_value"]),value,"")

expression: grel:value.replace("--Early works to 1900","").replace("--Early works to 1800","").replace("--Early works to 1700","").replace("--Early works to 1600","").replace("--Early works to 1500","").replace("--Pre-Linnean works","")
description: Text transform on cells in column recon-subject using expression grel:value.replace("--Early works to 1900","").replace("--Early works to 1800","").replace("--Early works to 1700","").replace("--Early works to 1600","").replace("--Early works to 1500","").replace("--Pre-Linnean works","")
Text transform on cells in column recon-subject using expression grel:value.replace(".","")
Reconcile cells in column recon-subject to type /fast/all

expression: grel:"SUBJECT RECON, STEP 3: START SUBJECT RECON 1 "+now()
description: Text transform on cells in column workflow_current using expression grel:"SUBJECT RECON, STEP 3: START SUBJECT RECON 1 "+now()
Text transform on cells in column workflow_history using expression grel:value + " | " + cells["workflow_current"].value
